alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued February 16 at 11:11AM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 37 REMAINS VALID UNTIL NOON CST TODAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN EAST ARKANSAS PHILLIPS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTH MISSISSIPPI BENTON COAHOMA DESOTO MARSHALL PANOLA QUITMAN TATE TUNICA IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN WEST TENNESSEE BENTON CARROLL CHESTER CROCKETT FAYETTE GIBSON HARDEMAN HAYWOOD HENDERSON HENRY LAUDERDALE MADISON SHELBY TIPTON WEAKLEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALAMO, ASHLAND, BARTLETT, BATESVILLE, BOLIVAR, BROWNSVILLE, CAMDEN, CLARKSDALE, COLLIERVILLE, COVINGTON, DRESDEN, GERMANTOWN, HELENA, HENDERSON, HOLLY SPRINGS, HUMBOLDT, HUNTINGDON, JACKSON, LEXINGTON, MARKS, MARTIN, MEMPHIS, MILAN, MILLINGTON, OAKLAND, OLIVE BRANCH, PARIS, RIPLEY TN, SENATOBIA, SOMERVILLE, SOUTHAVEN, TUNICA, AND WEST HELENA.
